children.text: Sleipnir Mobile for Android License Agreement

Sleipnir Mobile for Android License Agreement
 
 This Sleipnir Mobile for Android License Agreement (hereinafter called "this AGREEMENT") shall apply to any and all use by the user (hereinafter called "USER") of certain software provided by Fenrir Inc. (hereinafter called "COMPANY" and "this SOFTWARE," respectively). 
 
 Please use this SOFTWARE after agreeing to this AGREEMENT. By using this SOFTWARE, USER agrees to all the terms and conditions of this AGREEMENT.
 The use of this SOFTWARE without such agreement, including trial use, shall not be allowed. In such a case, USER must stop using this SOFTWARE and delete all files installed as soon as possible.
 
 1. This SOFTWARE
 
 (1) "This SOFTWARE" herein shall refer to the original of Sleipnir Mobile for Android and any copy thereof, including partial copies and copies connected with any other program. This SOFTWARE shall include instructions in a mechanically readable form, the components, data, and audiovisual contents such as images, text, sound and pictures thereof, and any other relevant license material.
 
 (2) USER shall use this SOFTWARE for their mobile terminal such as a smartphone on their own risk. This AGREEMENT shall not provide any guarantee that this SOFTWARE will run on all mobile terminals.
 
 (3) This SOFTWARE shall contain no harmful program of any kind such as spyware.
 
 (4) This SOFTWARE is not meant to be used for a system where a failure of this SOFTWARE may lead to death, injury, or any physical or environmental damage, such as nuclear facilities, aircraft, air traffic control, and medical systems.
 
 
 2. Licensed Contents
 
 (1) The copyright or any other right relating to this SOFTWARE shall belong to COMPANY. USER of this SOFTWARE shall be granted single-user rights for personal use of this SOFTWARE. This right shall not be held exclusively.
 
 (2) USER may use this SOFTWARE for a commercial or noncommercial purpose except as direct profits will be made from this SOFTWARE.
 
 (3) This AGREEMENT shall take effect at the time when USER starts to use this SOFTWARE.
 
 (4) The right to use the program licensed hereunder shall terminate by USER deleting such program from the storage medium. In this case, USER shall discard any and all data related to this SOFTWARE including any copies thereof.
 
 (5) The right to use this SOFTWARE shall continue effective until the termination of this AGREEMENT pursuant to the term of use hereof.
 
 
 3. Right to Redistribution
 
 (1) Redistribution of this SOFTWARE without the permission of COMPANY shall not be allowed.
 
 
 4. Fee
 (1) This SOFTWARE shall be provided for free, but any fees incurred for network access or data transmission or reception in downloading or using this SOFTWARE are the sole responsibility of USER.
 
 
 5. Prohibition
 
 (1) USER may not analyze or alter the whole or any part of this SOFTWARE in any manner, including modification, reverse-engineering, decompilation, or disassembling.
 
 (2) USER may not attempt to extract any source code or create any derivative work of this SOFTWARE in a manner stated in above (1) or otherwise.
 
 (3) USER may not remove or dispose of any proprietary rights, trademark, or copyright notice indicated on or contained in this SOFTWARE.
 
 
 6. Indemnity
 
 (1) COMPANY shall provide this SOFTWARE on an as-is basis as a specified article, and not be liable in any manner for any direct or indirect damage caused by this SOFTWARE or any equipment or media, which means that COMPANY shall provide no warranty of any kind with regard to this SOFTWARE. Furthermore, COMPANY shall not be liable for any consequential damage or loss resulting from the use of this SOFTWARE.
 
 (2) COMPANY may discontinue, change the contents of, or upgrade this SOFTWARE, or revise this AGREEMENT without prior notice to or consent of USER.
 
 (3) COMPANY shall not be obliged to upgrade or correct defects. 
 
 
 7. Court of Jurisdiction
 
 (1) This AGREEMENT shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Japan, and the Osaka District Court shall be the sole court having exclusive jurisdiction.
 
 8. Agreement on Use of Data
 
 (1) This SOFTWARE contains a function to inform USERs of updated data and programs. COMPANY shall be entitled to use USER's data to the extent that it is masked data for the purpose of fixing vulnerability and improving quality and functionality of this SOFTWARE.
 
 December, 2014
